event_summary: Mass protest rally organized against government policy with thousands participating
Arms cache recovered near border area includes 15 rifles and ammunition
12-hour bandh called by student union affecting markets and transportation
Peace dialogue meeting held between community leaders tension de-escalates
Rumor of water shortage circulates on social media leading to panic buying
Narcotics smuggling attempt foiled at border checkpoint 50kg seized
Highway blockade by farmers demanding compensation for crop damage
Border patrol reports suspicious movement along international boundary
Trade union strike at market hub causes business disruption
Misinformation about ethnic violence spreads rapidly across WhatsApp groups
